data.name: Raw April Day
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ§© Solve a variety of enigmatic puzzles

ðŸ’¬ Talk to a diverse cast of colorful characters searching for meaning

ðŸŽ’ Collect and combine items in your inventory

ðŸ”Ž Piece together the clues you gather to solve the mystery



Raw April Day is a Victorian, Mystery, Point-And-Click game in which Jacqueline searches for her missing husband (Vincent) in his apartment, and confronts a world gone topsy turvy. 8 year-old insomniacs living in treehouses act like Noir detectives, geriatric opera singers dressed to the nines daydream about romantic escapades and broken financiers search for a meaningful life; Jacqueline's increasingly chaotic journey through Vincent's articulately-constructed puzzle room is as much a story about human connection as a cautionary tale about the perils of youthful reckless abandon.

Raw April Day is a Victorian, Mystery, Point-And-Click game in which Jacqueline searches for her missing husband (Vincent) in his apartment, and confronts a world gone topsy turvy. 8 year-old insomniacs living in treehouses act like Noir detectives, geriatric opera singers dressed to the nines daydream about romantic escapades and broken financiers search for a meaningful life; Jacqueline's increasingly chaotic journey through Vincent's articulately-constructed puzzle room is as much a story about human connection as a cautionary tale about the perils of youthful reckless abandon.
data.short_description: Raw April Day is a hand-drawn Mystery Point-And-Click game where you solve enigmatic puzzles, engage in soul-searching branching dialogue with colorful characters and piece together the clues for why your husband went missing in a surreal and mystifying Victorian complex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Graphics card or greater
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB Graphics card or greater
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Depictions of Medium Gore and Violence, Self-Harm. Mild conversations about sexual acts.
